players.name: Alice
memory:
Bob: "
I am innocent and saw Charlie with Diana last night.
"
You: "Charlie and Diana are the only ones who could have killed Charlie. We should investigate them first."
Diana: "Charlie and Diana are the only ones who could have killed Charlie. We should investigate them first."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
